meanings.sent1: The car had a shiny films of wax on its surface.

meanings.sent3: The films of dust on the bookshelf made it look like a forgotten treasure.

meanings.sent5: The films of ice on the pond sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: We watched classic films at the movie night.
meanings.sent2: The film director was excited to start shooting the new films.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed mesmerized by the films playing on the TV.
